backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, tasks, daily content storage, and admin‑protected user management with authorization mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Initializes daily content map on first run by inserting a default reflection, hadith, and motivation entry.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard daily content improvements, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root that configures TanStack Router routes, auth guards, and the theme and layout shell.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyC: Carousel that displays daily Tadabbur, Hadith, and Islamic Quote content with loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyO: Displays five activity summary tiles for the selected date using task data from backend queries.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyP: Computes and displays daily worship completion progress using a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateSe: A popover calendar button that displays and updates a selected date.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders the site footer with dynamic year and a referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Authenticated header with theme toggle, user menu, navigation, and logout.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main routing outlet.
frontend/src/components/reports/Download: Form for selecting date range and generating a CSV, currently producing a placeholder file.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Context provider managing persisted light/dark/system theme and resolution.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Fasting: Displays and updates fasting status and notes for a selected date.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Murojaa: Allows input and validation of Murojaah surah and verse range, saving to backend.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Sedekah: Handles Sedekah completion with payment link integration and status display.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tahfidz: Captures and saves Tahfidz surah and verse range with validation.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tilawah: UI module for entering and saving tilawah data by fetching an existing task and updating surah and verse range.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity login state and provides user role, admin status, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, tasks, and daily content via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and logic for loading, logging in, and clearing stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables with an Islamic-inspired color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, InternetIdentityProvider, and React Query.
Renders the main admin panel with tab navigation for users, content, statistics, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DailyContentTab: Allows admins to view, edit, and save daily content including Quran reflections, hadith, and motivational quotes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides a form to view and update the Sedekah payment link with loading and save states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StatisticsTab.t: Displays user statistics based on a selected date range and shows overall participation metrics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementT: Lists users and includes functionality to create new user accounts via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing user profile setup, date selection, daily content, progress, and tracking modules.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity and redirecting if already logged in.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates CSV output from task data, formatting fields and escaping values safely.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Contains helpers for converting between dates and timestamps and formatting dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates surah verse ranges, ensuring required fields and correct numeric ordering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color palette, extended animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, architecture notes, known issues, and requirements for the Ramadhan Tracker app.
